evidence.title: README (segment 1)
README (segment 2)
evidence.excerpt: Style library, design system, composable components, and more.

evidence.title: README (segment 3)
evidence.excerpt: Tamagui is a bunch of libraries for building UIs that share code across React and React Native.

evidence.title: README (segment 4)
README (segment 5)
evidence.excerpt: - `@tamagui/core` - Universal style library for React. - `@tamagui/static` - Optimizing compiler that works with `core` and `tamagui`. - `tamagui` - UI kit that adapts to every platform.

evidence.title: README (segment 6)
evidence.excerpt: Tamagui lets you share more code between web and native apps without sacrificing the two things that typically suffer when you do: performance and code quality.

evidence.title: README (segment 7)
evidence.excerpt: It does this with an optimizing compiler that outputs platform-specific optimizations - it turns styled components, even with complex logic or cross-module imports, into a simple `div` alongside atomic CSS on the web, or a View with its style objects hoisted on native.

evidence.title: README (segment 8)
evidence.excerpt: The entirety of Tamagui works at compile time and runtime, and can be set up gradually, with initial usage as simple as importing it and using the base views and styled function.

evidence.title: Sheet with fit doesn't open to full height (on even opens)
evidence.excerpt: Sheet with fit doesn't open to full height (on even opens) (state:closed)

evidence.title: v2.0.0-rc.20
evidence.excerpt: ## Features - **static**: auto-optimize user-defined styled components behind enableDynamicEvaluation flag ([natew](https://github.com/tamagui/tamagui/commit/8d876968d448629feb37261789ce0e9e4691a2dc)) ## Bug Fixes - prevent animatedBy, unstyled, and marginLeft props from leaking to dom ([natew](https://github.com/tamagui/tamagui/commit/5fe753e2c467e30425c93eb057bcd24e81d8976d)) - **motion**: fix position flash and ghost elements during rapid tab hover switching ([natew](https://github.com/tamagui/tamagui/commit/d2cc63b18912ccc3683762f22bbbbb28306a9180)) - **popper**: prevent position jumps during hoverable close/open cycles ([natew](https://github.com/tamagui/tamagui/commit/aaec352516349024d0aad7db6093caa37208640f)) - **animation-css**: restore transition on interrupted exit ([natew](https://github.com/tamagui/tamagui/commit/e91fcc3e866f26702432b38a16c35f41f1de2d9f)) - **animations-motion**: add env flags for hacks, fix exit race conditions ([natew](https://github.com/tamagui/tamagui/commit/802e08d091a9e6f2dcf544babcba921152662c45)) - **popover**: fix hoverable multi-trigger not opening on hover ([natew](https://github.com/tamagui/tamagui/commit/43873e2c9d723635a25a042b1b99695a1ad…

evidence.title: v2.0.0-rc.19
evidence.excerpt: ## Bug Fixes - **menu**: avoid double-attaching press props ([natew](https://github.com/tamagui/tamagui/commit/e29cc1d74b841c4aecb7d2ab6881eac49c892bdc)) - **core**: fix backgroundImage + hsla with spaces ([natew](https://github.com/tamagui/tamagui/commit/afe33bcf27d435b7ab172d0de76af241779fe96e)) - **core**: fix ScrollView scrollbar hiding with rnw-lite ([natew](https://github.com/tamagui/tamagui/commit/137746b96dd04cb9001a6e7e09dbea2083cc0fc6)) - **sheet**: use useEvent for layout handler to fix fit mode reopen on native Fixes #3833 ([natew](https://github.com/tamagui/tamagui/commit/dfa1d24bb8c3eba48331c8f4d527b65547718251)) - **web**: fix react-native-web-lite deep imports for reanimated compatibility ([natew](https://github.com/tamagui/tamagui/commit/d78233efedce49c7376bab5da9c465e0284b5a5e)) - **animation-css**: fix hydration issue with animateOnly, fix animation hydration tests to be more accurate ([natew](https://github.com/tamagui/tamagui/commit/aff78aa7389346fb278b842c5630006b6812196d)) ## Tests - add ScrollView scrollbar hiding integration test with rnw-lite support ([natew](https://github.com/tamagui/tamagui/commit/44012683abd73c9c5b642c7264f21c8a2561d665)) ## Commits -…
